x-sap-shortText: API to get Service Provider (SP) metadata by company ID and data center domain name.

x-servers.description: OData APIs for the SuccessFactors Data Centers

info.title: Single Sign On (SSO)
info.description:
Use this API to get the service provider (SP) metadata and the domain name of your data center for configuring the single sign-on feature for your company.

 You can find your company's API server in [List of API Servers in SAP SuccessFactors.](https://help.sap.com/viewer/d599f15995d348a1b45ba5603e2aba9b/LATEST/en-US/af2b8d5437494b12be88fe374eba75b6.html)
